title: 이달의소녀탐구 #360 (LOONA TV #360)
summary:
0:01 -- LOONA 1/3 is doing their rehearsal. (Why does HeeJin do the love4eva choreo for Love&Live?)
0:09 -- Cheorry and YeoJin are watching them behind the stage. She feels great at first but then becomes really nervous. But she prepares well.
0:35 -- JinSoul watches her from the audience seats. She mentions that she is monitoring her since YeoJin never did any promotions before. She knows that YeoJin will do well on the upcoming fan meet as well.
0:56 -- "Actually, I have never heard her speaking so calmly."
